resources.string: Type a hostname or IP address in the input box below. Tap the buttons below the input box to enable common arguments. Some arguments require root. After clicking run, the result of running Nmap will be displayed below. Explanations of all Nmap arguments can be found in the manpage provided in the options menu.

Type a hostname or IP address followed by all arguments you wish to pass to Nmap below. Some arguments require root. After clicking run, the result of running Nmap will be displayed below. Explanations of all Nmap arguments can be found in the manpage provided in the options menu.
